Articles.Content:
False, not in 5 hours at least .

The person below me is below me.

False, you are not on top of me.

The user below me enjoys rss and far together.

false, they stress my system out too much and far just kills every rocket I try :-(

The person below me works in aviation for a living.

Nope, under 18.

The user below me has a dog.

I do not believe that I own it, it has free will, I just live with it, one cannot own another living being with free will.

The user below me has/had glasses.

Edited December 24, 2014 by LABHOUSE

Nope, lucky enough to have 20/15 (or it was last time I had my eyes checked, may have degraded with age since then).

The user below me is spending the holidays away from home.

Yeah, at work.

The user below me speaks Chinish. Or Japanean...

You mean Japanese? I speak neither

The user below me is bald.

hopefully not for a long while.

the user below me has put more hours into a game that isnt ksp than he/she has into ksp itself.

Not yet, working on it. Unless i decide to find a less stressful job x-]

Aww man, ninja'd...

False... I think with ksp i broke all my previous records. (I think it was diablo 1, some time ago... xP)

The user below me speaks fluent Antarctican.

Edited December 24, 2014 by Overfloater

Pingu. Pingu pingu?

The user below me lives or has visited this "wonderful" place known as the South West of Britain!

Yep, but is it really "wonderful"??

South East FTW!!!

The user below me is part of the light green group.

I am, though I find it a bit baffling.

The user below me has only one rep bar.

Not any more!!!!:):)

The user below me loves Mariokart Wii.

Nope.

The user below me is past the international date line (aka one day ahead of the rest of the world).

...Yes?

I'm not sure you know how the international date line works.

The user below me has no idea what a Snarbolax is. (NO LOOKING IT UP UNTIL YOU REPLY)

No, I've faced it before. It's a Giant creature way above the Wolvers, and it hungers for knights.

The user before me knows who Godot is.

nope. thought I did, before i realized i got it confused with village building simulator "godus"

User below me received some article of clothing as a gift within the past 48 hours.

Nope, A 3D-Pen and A Useless Box.

The user below me can do the Macarena

HELL YEAH!!!!

The user below me has a youtube channel

Well, I think it's a true.

The user below me doesn't like milk.

False.

The user below me likes Portal more than Half-Life.

True, the humor in Portal was much better.

The user below me is planning to shop during Boxing Day sales.

False.

Merica! No boxing day here!

The user below me likes consoles more than PCs.

nope, PC MASTER RACE!!

The user below me is currently playing/loading KSP while reading this.
